hero.label: Courier Express
hero.title: Express deliveries when you need them most
hero.subtitle: Fast and secure shipments for your business.

pitch.text: At YOBEL we understand that time is money. Our express courier service guarantees fast, secure deliveries with complete traceability so your business never stops.

items.title: Same Day Delivery
items.desc: Same-day deliveries for urgent shipments within the city.

items.title: Next Day Delivery
items.desc: Guaranteed shipments for the next day nationwide.

items.title: Corporate Courier
items.desc: Customized solutions for companies with high shipping volumes.

items.title: E-commerce Fulfillment
items.desc: Comprehensive shipment management for online stores.

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.subtitle: Speed and reliability in every shipment.
items: Automatic notifications for you and your customer.
Digital proof of delivery with signature and photo.

processes.subtitle: Speed without compromise
processes.title: Our courier process is designed to maximize speed without sacrificing security.
processes.label: Processes

items.title: Collection
items.desc: We pick up your package at the location you indicate.

items.title: Sorting
items.desc: Fast processing at our distribution center.

items.title: Transportation
items.desc: Shipping via the most efficient route with GPS tracking.

items.question: What is the cutoff time for same day delivery?
items.answer: Shipments requested before 12:00 PM are delivered the same day.

items.question: Do you make deliveries on weekends?
items.answer: Yes, we offer Saturday delivery service in selected areas.

items.question: What is the maximum weight you can transport?
items.answer: Our courier service handles packages up to 30 kg.

items.question: Do you have insurance for shipments?
items.answer: Yes, all shipments include basic coverage with an optional additional insurance.
